parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To put, place upon, lay on; I add, give in addition. From epi and tithemi; to impose.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Infirm, sick, ill, feeble, sickly. Infirm.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From the same as therapon; to wait upon menially, i.e. to adore, or to relieve.
